subject: Fix chat deletion and add refresh buttons
body:
- Add debug logging to chat deletion flow (endChat, handleEndChat, ChatListItem)
- Add refresh button to home screen header (shows ⏳ when refreshing)
- Add refresh button to chat screen header (shows ⏳ when refreshing)
- Remove manual pull-to-refresh scroll detection from chat screen
- The debug logs will help identify why chat deletion isn't working as expected
title: Fix chat deletion and add refresh buttons
